data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 326,772 believers in Xuchang, Henan, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xuchang, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Xuchang, Henan, China honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Xuchang, Henan, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Xuchang, Henan, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Xuchang, Henan, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Xuchang, Henan, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Xuchang that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Xuchang, Henan, China to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

location.name: Xuchang
